directions: Cut raw chicken to pieces and season the chicken with salt and pepper, then sprinkle with corn starch and rub the corn starch into the chicken.
In a saucepan, whisk together the sauce ingredients. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat and cook for 5 minutes. Remove from heat.
Stir-fry the chicken for 4-5 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through. Add the onions and other veggies and stir-fry until the beans and broccoli are tender-crisp.
Add the sauce, a few tablespoons at a time, allowing the sauce to bubble up after each addition.
ingredients: 2 tbsp brown sugar (or 1 tbsp or none)
-JiKPsX4C4bPFETEUGNm.name: Citrus Chicken Stir Fry

directions: Grill chicken breasts with onions until tender.
Cook pasta for 5 minutes, then add broccoli and cook 3 minutes more.

Heat a medium sauce pot over medium-low heat. Add butter and melt, then add flour & cayenne and whisk together over low heat until roux bubbles then cook a minute more. Whisk in milk, cheese, mustard and stock over medium-low heat to bring the sauce to a quick boil. Simmer until the sauce thickens about 5 minutes. Constantly stir to melt everything. Season sauce with salt and pepper.
Drain pasta and broccoli florets & add to the pot and add chicken to the mix. Combine sauce with everything.
ingredients: 1 pound macaroni elbows or corkscrew shaped pasta twists
-JiKhu4mitk-k5Im5Uk5.name: Mac & Cheese with Broccoli & Chicken

directions: Cook pork chops in oil and sprinkle with half the garlic powder. Cook until browned, about 3 minutes. Turn chops over, sprinkle with remaining garlic powder, and pan-fry chops for 3 more minutes.
Mix honey and mustard together in a bowl until thoroughly combined.
Drip honey mustard sauce over chops, turn them over, and cook for 5 minutes; repeat with the other side. Cook until chops are no longer pink inside.
-JiKimjhkH0eg6iDegHO.name: Honey Dijon Pork

directions: Marinade beef with sauce.
Beat the eggs with the salt.
In a heated wok, add minced garlic, then the onions and carrots. Stir-fry for 1 – 2 minutes till softened. Add the beef and let brown briefly, then stir-fry until it changes color.
Reduce the heat to medium. Add the rice, stirring and turning it over with a spatula to break up any clumps.
Make a room in one corner of the wok and pour in the beaten egg. Scramble the egg and then combine with the fried rice.
-JiKj5cAd8f-98f49UFG.name: Beef Fried Rice

directions: Saute onion, green pepper, carrot till tender. Stir in flour til blended. Gradually add broth and bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 min or until thickened.
Transfer to slow cooker. Stir in sausage, tomatoes, oregano, thyme and cayenne. Cover and cook on high for 4-5 hours or until veggies are tender. Serve with rice.
-JiKjpLvha-Wc_AZWmGq.name: Gumbo

directions: Cut meat into small pieces, mix with Sauce and marinade
Stir-fry meat, then any green onions until fragrant. Remove and serve.
-JiKkPQ5-Bdx6SCvtwgu.name: Stir-fried Pork

directions: cook mushroom and onions
sprinkle flour on 4 pork ribs (both sides)
mix 1 mushroom can of milk with cream of mushroom
create opening on pan and cook all pork ribs in middle (open lid), flip ribs 45deg after each min - 2min
remove mushrooms/onions from pan after 5min
add oil, cook pork on medium heat (covered; flip occasionally; cut open) for 2 min
pour in cream and veggies and mix, then cover and steam for 3-5 min
Check for raw pork, if so, cook for another 3-5 min
-JiKkpIGe01e9I_5Vh__.name: Pork Chops

directions: Bring water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 20 min or until desired softness.
Cook the chicken breasts & season with salt & pepper to taste.
Make the sauce: combine 1 tbsp garlic, 1 tsp salt, 1/4 cup balsamic vinegar, 1 tbsp sweet white wine, 1/4 cup olive oil.
Cook spinach for 30 seconds.
Drain pasta and pour into a pan. Add the cooked chicken on top and pour the sauce evenly over the pasta. Add tomatoes and cook on medium heat while mixing the creation for 2 min.
-JiKl5ueOCr5xlNniora.name: Penne Fresca

directions: Bring water to a boil. Throw in 2 packs of noodles and cook for 5 min or until desired softness.
Meanwhile, whisk together peanut butter, lime juice, soy sauce, brown sugar and oil.
Drain noodles and put into a pan. Pour in the above mixture with the noodles and chicken and mix evenly.
ingredients: 1 small red bell pepper, thinly sliced
-JiKlQ8AXmiZB-K-yJLm.name: Thai Peanut Noodles

directions: Cook 1 cup of rice.
Steam chopped broccoli and stems until tender but still bright green.
Cook some chicken and sprinkle with salt & pepper.
Put rice, broccoli and chicken together in the casserole pot.

Put some oil in skillet. Add onions, garlic, and mushrooms and saute until softened. Stir in flour and cook about one minute to take away the raw flour taste. Whisk in milk and continue whisking until slightly thickened. Season with salt and pepper. Add 1½ cup cheese, 3-4 spoonfuls of sour cream and stir to melt.
Pour the above mixture into the casserole pot and stir until evenly distributed. Sprinkle with remaining ½ cup cheese.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 25 min.
ingredients: 4 cups (10 ounces) fresh broccoli florets and stems, chopped (stems should be VERY finely chopped)
-JiKldl1hubXJ27bA6If.name: Broccoli Rice with Chicken

directions: Season tenderloin with salt and pepper.
Combine oil, vinegar & mustard in a medium bowl. Place tenderloin in balsamic mixture and let marinade for 30 minutes.
Saute steak & marinade for 3-4 minutes or until medium rare.
Add mushrooms and stir to combine.
-JiKm9qlmPWT6hhJ1Ke2.name: Balsamic Beef Tenderloin Tips
